concept.title: Starting, stopping, and viewing the status of the protocol plug-in server process
concept.shortdesc: You can start and stop the protocol plug-in server process by using .

conbody.p:
The plug-in server process status determines what actions can be carried out on the protocol plug-in server process. You can view the status by using a .
If the protocol plug-in server process status is Inactive, the process is not running. You can start the process.
If the server status is Active, the process is running. You can stop the process.
